name: Voodoo Escape
description: Voodoo Escape is a platforming game with a maximum of three levels. The story revolves around a witch doctor who owns a spellcraft shop. One day, a witch visits his shop and the witch doctor gets cursed by her.  As a result, the witch doctor is forced him to take part in her trials. The player assumes the role of the witch doctor and must manuever him through platform levels and succeed at the levels to beat the witch.
